DataElement.preferredName: Recipient Hospital Patient Discharge From First Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Admission Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the recipient was first discharged from hospital from the initial transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells admission.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Recipient Hospital Patient Discharge From First Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Admission Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who gets something._An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured._The release of a patient from a course of care._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases._The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who gets something.:An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.:In healthcare, discharge represents the end point of an inpatient hospital contact which consists of one or several days of care. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.
The release of a patient from a course of care.

Property.preferredName: From First Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Admission Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases.:The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases.
The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
